poll_list.title: Multi-language support （关于多语言支持的提案）
poll_list.body:
Hello community, I'm new to gitcoin and the future this community envisions is particularly fascinating, it's a new world of freedom for me.
Likewise, there must be many new people from all over the world joining in like me, and I think it's time for the community to consider supporting multiple languages, so that more people from more regions can join in and make the community even more DAO.

Suggestions for supporting multiple languages.
1. the official forum to add multi-language entrance, friends from different regions choose to enter their own language directory to participate in the discussion, similar to the directory function. I am also a developer myself, if necessary, I am willing to participate in it!
2. the official website to increase the multilingual version, the official multiple product pages, including many learning materials and documents can support multilingual, convenient for friends in different regions to participate and learn.

The above is my first proposal as a newcomer, welcome to correct any deficiencies (English is automatically translated from Deepl. (Cry with laughter)

For the multilingual proposal, especially important is the Chinese users, which is a very large team, never lack of excellent developers, investors, evangelists, and a large number of high-quality Internet groups willing to actively participate in governance.



中文原文：

各位社区的朋友们好，我是gitcoin的新朋友，这个社区所构想的未来特别迷人，对我来说这是个自由的新大陆。
同样，一定有许多世界各地的新朋友和我一样也加入了进来，我觉得社区可以考虑支持多语言了，让更多地区的朋友加入进来，让社区更加的DAO。

支持多语言的建议：
1. 官方论坛增加多语言的入口，不同地区的朋友选择进入各自语言目录参与讨论，类似目录功能。我本身也是一名开发者，如果有需要，我非常愿意参与进来
2. 官方网站增加多语言的版本，官方的多个产品页，包括许多的学习资料和文档可以支持多语言，方便不同地区的朋友参与和学习。

以上就是作为新手的我，第一次提案，有不足的地方欢迎指正（英文从Deepl自动翻译而来 (笑哭)）

对于多语言的提案中，尤其重要的是中文用户，这是一个非常庞大的队伍，从来不缺乏优秀的开发者、投资者、布道者，还有大量愿意积极参与治理的高质量互联网群体。
poll_list.author: 0xE60dc42fD35bca913C6C7ef00237E7E338318fd5

content.content: Currently there are 5 posts and 2 votes (on snapshots) about multiple language in discussion, please see the reference. There is one workstream of Decentralize Gitcoin, I believe multiple language should be part of decentralization. If we care about multiple language support, maybe we could gather the feedback from the community, (or a poll) and then make decision to support what language first. reference  create multi-language community: Create multi-language community  Multi-language version: Multi-language version  Build multiple language community: Built multiple language community  [Proposal-Lang] 参与投票支持多语言的提案（加入Gitcoin中文社群）: [Proposal-Lang] 参与投票支持多语言的提案（加入Gitcoin中文社群）  [Snapshot Proposal - Add Quest to onboard new non-English-speaking user] 提供Quest内容给非英语用户Espanol,中文,にほんご Tiếng Việt etc: [Snapshot Proposal - Add Quest to onboard new non-English-speaking user] 提供Quest内容给非英语用户Espanol,中文,にほんご Tiếng Việt etc   Snapshot  Add Quest for non-English-speaking user Multi-language support
Thanks for organizing all these threads Bob, I’d personally love to see more multi-language support. Based on the threads, I do think Mandarin makes the most sense to start.
Yes its nice idea to create multiple language
Looking at what this platform stands for, I would say that this is a nice idea…multi language forum will aid help to unanswered questions…and make this community more friendly.
I totally support your idea. Let’s move to make this change.
